description: mounted to ivory sheet with pale red borders; sketchy figures in clouds; two central figures look down; figures at left conversing together; one figure in URC looks up; verso not examined--received framed
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, July 4, 1975, no. 117, as Circle of Lanfranco, 'to Lowe; [Lorna Lowe, London, until 1976; sold July 14, as Attributed to Bonecchi, for Â£300, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1976-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Angels Looking Down from Clouds (recto and verso)
